question: Display an image that when clicked will link to the Google search engine(should be opened in a new window).\n The source for the image is: /images/ex2.jpg
hint: Hint: What attributes does the <a> tag have? We'll definitely need the href one.
correct_input: Click on the image to be taken to the Google search engine.
end_part: Click on the image to be taken to the Google search engine.
